channel.title: pcie on Better Tomorrow with Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in pcie on Better Tomorrow with Computer Science

item.title: NVMeDirect
item.description: NVMeDirect Overview NVMeDirect is a software framework that is used to directly access to a NVMe SSD from a user space application.

item.title: Introduction to VFIO
item.description: Virtual Function I/O (VFIO) Introduced to replace the old-fashioned KVM PCI device assignment (virtio).

item.title: PCI Express I/O System
item.description: I/O Hardware Overview The basic I/O hardware elements, such as ports, buses, and device controllers, accomodate a wide variety of I/O devices.
